snippet.title: Fable Fortune Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Play as one of six unique Heroes in a collectible card game that combines the iconic world and characters of Albion with fast-paced and thrilling tactical gameplay. In Fable Fortune, your destiny is on the cards!

Fable Fortune, out now in Game Preview for Xbox One and Windows 10, as well as Early access for Steam PC!

Xbox Platforms: https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9MSWWJWRF4WC 
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/469830/Fable_Fortune/

Players can gain early access to Fable Fortune by picking up the Founder's pack, which is the best way fans can support this development whilst also gaining some amazing rewards and the undying gratitude of the developers.

EXCLUSIVE Content for Founders includes:
• 20 Card Packs 
• Chicken Vengeant, Unique Founders Card
• Bonus Fabled Card, Giant Egg
